clinical_study.brief_title: Mindfulness-based Sex Therapy on Patients With Takotsubo Cardiomyopathy
clinical_study.official_title: Mindfulness-based Sex Therapy on Patients With Takotsubo Cardiomyopathy Among Iranian Women

brief_summary.textblock: Takotsubo cardiomyopathy (TC) is a type of non-ischemic cardiomyopathy in which there is a sudden temporary weakening of the myocardium. . In a recent study, women report more sexual dysfunction than men after 1 year after TC. Despite that a number of studies have assessed female sexual dysfunction (FSD) for TC , there is no information regarding prevalence and associated factors on FSD in women with TC. However, in a recent study on Iranian female patients with TC, more than 77% of these patients suffered from FSD. This study is aimed to assess the effectiveness of a Mindfulness-based Sex Therapy on Patients With TC.

primary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
primary_outcome.description: Sexual functioning is assessed using self-reported measure , female Sexual Function Index (FSFI)

primary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
primary_outcome.description: Female Sexual Distress Scale;The FSDS-R is a self-reported questionnaire consisting of 13 items assessing different aspects of sexual activity-related distress in women

primary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
primary_outcome.description: Personal Assessment of Intimacy in Relationships (PAIR) will use to assess relationship satisfaction. The PAIR is a self-reported measure with 36 items which cover five subscales

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Sexual Five-Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire (FFMQ-S) is used to assess mindfulness in the context of sexual encounters

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: The Maudsley Marital Questionnaire (MMQ) is a 20-item instrument measuring marital satisfaction.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS) is a brief self-administrated tool to assess psychological distress in patients as well as general populations

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Rumination is measured using Ruminative Thought Style Questionnaire (RTS). The RTS contains 20 items describing positive, negative and neutral facets of global rumination

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Persons' emotions in response to stressful life events is measured using he Cognitive Emotion Regulation Questionnaire short version (CERQ-short).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: HRQoL is measured using Short Form health survey (SF-12).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Social support will be assessed by the ENRICHD Social Support Inventory (ESSI ).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline, 1 Months ,6 months, 12 months and 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Sense of coherence will be measured using the Antonovsky's 13-item sense of coherence scale (SOC-13).

intervention.description: It is based on an integration of psychoeducation, sex therapy, and mindfulness-based skills. the intervention will be delivered by a group of facilitators on a group based weekly.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- aged 18 years old at least
- confirmed diagnosis of TC by a cardiologist according Mayo Clinic diagnostic criteria; an acute left ventricular apical ballooning of unknown cause
- willingness to partaking for the duration of the trial
- a basic fluency in Persian
- living with a partner/spouse
Exclusion Criteria:
- cognitive disability
- having acute myocardial infarction
- cerebrovascular disease
- pheochromocytoma and viral or idiopathic myocarditis
- , participating in another RCT
